00069 void
00070  basic_strssi<CharT>::init (const base_type& path_)
00071 {
00072         std::ifstream file ((root+path_).c_str ());
00073         if ( !file.is_open())
00074                 throw err::noxcept ("strssi::init");

00076         std::stringstream sstr;

00083 basic_strssi<CharT>&
00084  basic_strssi<CharT>::ssi (const base_type& path_)
00085 {
00086         std::ifstream file ((root+path_).c_str ());
00087         if ( !file.is_open())
00088                 return *this;
00089 
00090         std::stringstream sstr;
00091         file >> std::noskipws >> sstr.rdbuf ();
00092         file.close ();
00093 
00094         size_type begn, end, centr;
00095         if ( (centr= base_type::find (path_)) != base_type::npos
00096         &&   (begn = base_type::rfind ("<!--#", centr)) != base_type::npos
00097         &&   (end  = base_type::find ("-->", centr)) != base_type::npos)
00098                 base_type::replace (begn, end-begn+3, sstr.str()) ;
00099 
00100         return *this;
